snippet: A TV show’s name is not meant to be seen as an invitation to seek culinary success through bodily harm.
abstract: Loose Ends column by Dan Barry humorously mocks name of television show Cook Your Ass Off, which is premiering on the HLN cable network; cautions viewers not to take the title literally.
lead_paragraph: A TV show’s name is not meant to be seen as an invitation to seek culinary success through bodily harm.

headline.print_headline: One Cooking Show You Shouldn’t Try at Home
headline.main: One Cooking Show You Shouldn’t Try at Home
